description:
Don’t let the sun chase you out of your hammock. With 2 poles that extend from your Swiftlet stand, you have the perfect place to set up a tarp, to give your hammock a roof or a wall.

  • Grommets accommodate most tarps, including the Kuhli, Kuhli UL, and Kuhli Pro
  • Poles can be adjusted via quick-release and push buttons, making it easy to change the tarp position and fit with different sized tarps
  • Stainless steel, aluminum and UV resistant plastic construction
  • Includes: 2 × swiftlet shade poles and 4 × silicone straps
name: Kammok Swiftlet Shade
